dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2786 : To amend the Federal Power Act with respect to the criteria and process to qualify as a qualifying conduit hydropower facility.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Received; read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Federal Power Act with respect to the criteria and process to qualify as a qualifying conduit hydropower facility.

section.text: Section 30(a) of the Federal Power Act (16 U.S.C. 823a(a)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (2)(C), by striking 45 days and inserting 30 days; and

subparagraph.text: in clause (i), by adding and after the semicolon;

attestation-group.attestation-date: Passed the House of Representatives July 18, 2017.
